amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary to study and evaluate the availability of natural gas and oil deposits located off the coasts of Louisiana and Texas.
amendment.purpose: Part B amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 107-178 to require the Secretary to study and evaluate the availability of natural gas and oil deposits located off the coasts of Louisiana and Texas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
